mapper.select: select sum(pdpr_LiveVaccine) pdpr_LiveVaccine, sum(pdpr_LiveBreedingSheep) pdpr_LiveBreedingSheep, sum(pdpr_LiveGoat) pdpr_LiveGoat, sum(pdpr_LiveSheep) pdpr_LiveSheep from animal_disease.b_pestedespetitsruminants where pdpr_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND pdpr_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select t1.Liv_regionCode as pdpr_regionCode ,t1.Liv_regionName as pdpr_regionName,t2.* from (select Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName from animal_disease.b_wlivestockinout GROUP by Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName ) as t1 LEFT JOIN ( select pdpr_regionCode, sum(pdpr_LiveVaccine) pdpr_LiveVaccine, sum(pdpr_LiveBreedingSheep) pdpr_LiveBreedingSheep, sum(pdpr_LiveGoat) pdpr_LiveGoat, sum(pdpr_LiveSheep) pdpr_LiveSheep from animal_disease.b_pestedespetitsruminants where pdpr_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP by pdpr_regionCode ) as t2 on t1.Liv_regionCode=t2.pdpr_regionCode ORDER by t1.Liv_regionCode
